title: druumabb
author: druumabb
content: Instructions on how to get ETHW for those who stored Ethereum in Trezor and Ledger wallets.As you know, Ethereum moved from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake network - to get ETHW coins from a Trezor or Ledger wallet, follow the steps.Instruction:https://logll.com/how-to-get-ethw-after-merging-ethereum-with-trezor-or-ledger/Everything works. Safe.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: I'll wait it officially until Ledger announces if there will be a token that's claimable like this. And I guess for those Trezor owners too.It's better to have those step by step coming from the official wallet manufacturers so that there won't be any problem that will be met. Well, that's me just to be sure before I claim that there's a free token.If there's none, it's okay.

comments.author: druumabb
comments.body: Submitted to the creators of Trezor on Reddit for review. They approve the posting instructions.https://www.reddit.com/r/TREZOR/comments/xco70w/ethw/ioyx5zg/?context=3

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on September 19, 2022, 10:45:06 AMI'll wait it officially until Ledger announces if there will be a token that's claimable like this. And I guess for those Trezor owners too.It's better to have those step by step coming from the official wallet manufacturers so that there won't be any problem that will be met. Well, that's me just to be sure before I claim that there's a free token.If there's none, it's okay.Wallet developers will not make official support for every useless Ethereum hard fork. Using the new network in a metamask is safe, the main thing is not to confuse it with the original network when sending your tokens ETF Networkhttps://twitter.com/EthereumFair/status/1570322701457453057"Add ETF Network to Metamask ===Network Name : EthereumFairNew RPC URL:  https://rpc.etherfair.orgChain ID: 513100Currency Symbol:  ETFETF Explorer: https://explorer.etherfair.org"

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: Quote from: druumabb on September 18, 2022, 07:09:53 PMInstructions on how to get ETHW for those who stored Ethereum in Trezor and Ledger wallets.As you know, Ethereum moved from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake network - to get ETHW coins from a Trezor or Ledger wallet, follow the steps.Instruction:https://logll.com/how-to-get-ethw-after-merging-ethereum-with-trezor-or-ledger/Everything works. Safe.thanks for the tutorial and i just added network ETHW on my metamask wallet, i've seen my ETHW in my metamask wallet now ,everything is really safeQuote from: zasad@ on September 21, 2022, 06:10:26 PMETF Networkhttps://twitter.com/EthereumFair/status/1570322701457453057"Add ETF Network to Metamask ===Network Name : EthereumFairNew RPC URL:  https://rpc.etherfair.orgChain ID: 513100Currency Symbol:  ETFETF Explorer: https://explorer.etherfair.org"I will add this network too, thanks

comments.author: druumabb
comments.body: Yes. We checked it out ourselves. It's working.
